cause.description:
Let's push to have all 50 states include a deposit on at least some plastic and aluminum containers (pop, beer, etc), and promote more recycling drop-off centers across the country for items that do not include the deposit!
1. Decrease the amount of plastic headed to landfills & get it recycled!
2. Make recycling more convenient, efficient, and worthwhile!
cause.mission: Make plastic & aluminum recycling easier so everyone can participate!
cause.name: Environmental Bounty
